input_text:
Job Title: Typescript backend developer on AWS

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Highlights:Job Title: Full stack TypeScript Developer - Backend tech lead with AWS StackExperience: Minimum of 5+ year's experience.Location: RemoteJob Description** Principals only please. Open to Corp-to-Corp or W2 . For the right candidate we will sponsor H1B. **We're looking for a TypeScript full stack tech developer with AWS with a minimum of 5 years of experience developing and scaling processes, front end application development using React.js and Apiâ€™s processing front-end transactions on AWS for one of our direct clients. If you are ambitious, driven, have a sense of ownership, and can hit the ground running quickly we want you. We are looking for folks who can thrive in a dynamic and fast paced environment. You will be collaborating closely with our Product, and Engineering teams every step of the way, creating and delivering best-in-class solutions for our clients.Technical Skills:Expertise in Typescript middle tier (Nodejs, REST APIs, GraphQL, Axios, PgTyped, Jest, Middy, Swagger, Zod)Expertise in Typescript on the front end with React.js functional components, MUI, consuming REST and GraphQL APIsProficient in Typescript concepts such as destructuringVery good understanding of data modeling and storage using SQL (Postgres)Deep interest and expertise in building data intensive applicationsGood understanding of software architecture and designExperienced with integrating multiple applications in AWS or other hosted platformsExperience with (AWS Cognito, Lambda, API Gateway, Lambda layers, CloudWatch, Log Insight, Cloud Development Kit, SNS , SQS, S3, Cognito, IAM, CFT, Sam local, SQL, AWS cdkJob Responsibilities:Apply best practices and develop high quality production-grade scalable application componentsApply software engineering principles, patterns, and practices and mentor junior members of the team to improve their craft.Interact with external teams and navigate ambiguous situations for the optimal solution.Excellent communication skillsWrite unit and automation tests.Troubleshoot, debug, and maintain applications.Create security and data protection settingsWork with the platform engineering team to create and manage CI/CD pipelines and infrastructureInteract with external development teams, drive solutions based on customer priority and with a view to improving efficiencyDemonstrate accountability in deliverablesSupport production on a rotation policy basisAbout Us:Yotta Tech Ports Inc., is a software solutions, products and services company headquartered in Virginia, USA with development centers in Dallas,TX, USA and Hyderabad, India. We offer innovative and customer centric information technology experience, build seamless software/products and provide hassle free services.Job Type: Full-timeSalary: $50.00 - $70.00 per hourBenefits for W2 Associates:Paid time off401(k)Compensation package:Hourly/Yearly payExperience level:5+ yearsSchedule:8 hour shiftExperience:Typescript 3+ Years (Required)AWS: 2+ years (Required)React/NodeJS/: 2+ years (Required)APIs: 2+ year (Required)Work Location: RemoteJob Types: Full-time, Contract
Pay: $55.00 - $70.00 per hour
Experience level:10 years11+ years5 years6 years7 years8 years9 yearsSchedule:8 hour shiftApplication Question(s):Current locationLinkedIn profile URL(If you do not have one please do not apply)Experience:AWS: 2 years (Required)TypeScript: 3 years (Required)NodeJS/React: 2 years (Required)GraphQL: 1 year (Required)Work Location: Remote

Experience Level (if available): None
